actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the issuance to a minor of a passport which would permit him to leave the United States in violation of legal custody order.

summary.text: Prohibits the issuance to an unmarried minor under 18 years of age of a passport which would permit him to leave the United States in violation of a legal custody order.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the issuance to a minor of a passport which would permit him to leave the United States in violation of legal custody order.
